//Generated by BehavEd

wait ( $random( 15000, 35000 )$ );
set ( "SET_STATIONARY", "OFF" );
set ( "SET_SEARCH_OFF", "ON" );
set ( "SET_TASK_SPEED", "1 - None" );

task ( "walk" )
{
	set ( "SET_TASK", "Path" );
	set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_NAVGOAL", "scientist" );
}

dowait ( "walk" );

task ( "walk to" )
{
	set ( "SET_TASK", "WALK" );
	set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_NAVGOAL", "scientist01" );
}

dowait ( "walk to" );
set ( "SET_STATIONARY", "ON" );
